alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 6:36PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northern Madison and east central Limestone Counties through 715 PM CST... At 635 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvest, or near Madison, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Athens, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Redstone Arsenal, Hazel Green, Skyline, Gurley and Harvest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
